entries.text:
• Attack the Rubicon Liberation Front's dam complex and destroy all generator facilities.
• Accompanied by friendly craft.

• Attack the Rubicon Liberation Front's dam complex and destroy all generator facilities.
• Accompanied by friendly craft.

• Assist the assault on the Rubicon Liberation Front stronghold and destroy the JUGGERNAUT heavy mobile artillery platform.
• Mid-route rendezvous with friendly craft.
• Extra rewards based on number of enemies destroyed.
• Eliminate the SG squad in the Watchpoint and destroy the device in the control center at the heart of the complex.
• Eliminate the SG squad in the Watchpoint and destroy the device in the control center at the heart of the complex.
• Infiltrate BAWS Arsenal No. 2 and determine why it went silent.
• Destroy the weaponized mining ship STRIDER, a key military asset of the Rubicon Liberation Front.

• Recover at least 5 combat logs from MT wrecks.
• Mission must be completed within time limit.
• Extra rewards based on the logs recovered.

• Infiltrate Grid 086 and reach the center.
• Extra rewards based on number of enemies destroyed.
• Escort the Rubicon Liberation Front helicopter deployed on a prisoner rescue operation.

• Eliminate V.VII Swinburne of the Vespers.
• Immediate mission failure if identified by surveillance MTs equipped with capture cameras.
• Reach the intercontinental cargo launcher found deep within the outer shell area of upper Grid 086.

• Eliminate the Planetary Closure Administration squads carrying out a mandatory inspection.
• Mid-route rendezvous with friendly craft.

• Prevent export of Coral by corporate forces.
• Immediate mission failure if 5 or more transport helicopters leave the combat zone.

• Defend the main missile of the RaD missile battery until the launch sequence completes.
• Additional rewards for defending sub-missiles.

• Destroy all hacking drones installed in Grid 086.
• Mission failure if hack is allowed to complete.
• Defend the weaponized mining ship STRIDER, a key military asset of the Rubicon Liberation Front.

• Attack the Arquebus survey camp and seize the corporation's observation data.
• Extra rewards based on number of enemies destroyed.

• Attack the refueling base seized by the Planetary Closure Administration and destroy the energy plant within.
• Extra rewards based on number of enemies/fuel storage tanks destroyed.

• Attack the base seized by the Planetary Closure Administration and destroy all berthed warships.
• Mid-route rendezvous with friendly craft.
• Extra rewards based on number of enemies destroyed.

• Destroy the Ice Worm, a massive weapon deployed by the Planetary Closure Administration.
• Arquebus will provide a prototype weapon to ensure breach of the Ice Worm's Coral shielding.
Shoulder weapon: VE-60SNA ("Stun Needle Launcher")

• Eliminate "Honest" Brute, a Doser hiding out in Grid 012.
• Extra rewards based on number of enemies destroyed.

• Destroy the deprecated device deep within the underground tunnel.
• Extra rewards based on number of enemies destroyed.
• Destroy the Planetary Closure Administration Special Forces craft CATAPHRACT.

• Salvage historic data scattered throughout the subterranean tunnel.
• No base pay. Compensation derived from saleable data recovered from PCA wrecks.
• Penetrate the subterranean facility and destroy the NEPENTHES energy weapon platform.

• Continue infiltration of the subterranean facility and reach the deepest point.
• Extra rewards based on number of enemies destroyed.

• Continue infiltration of the subterranean facility and reach the deepest point.
• Extra rewards based on number of enemies destroyed.

• Destroy the core of the subterranean facility reactor and disable the laser barrier.
• Extra rewards based on number of enemies destroyed.
• Head deep into unknown territory to find the Coral convergence. • Eliminate your pursuer.
• Head deep into unknown territory to find the Coral convergence. • Eliminate your pursuer.
• Eliminate the 2 ACs dispatched by the corporations and reach the Coral convergence.
• Eliminate the 2 ACs dispatched by the corporations and reach the Coral convergence.

• Eliminate V.V Hawkins and V.VIII Pater of the Vespers.
• Accompanied by friendly craft.

• Reach the designated coordinates.
• Supplied AC is an old model and poorly equipped for combat.
• Defend the control tower until systems takeover of the floating city Xylem is complete.

• Eliminate V.I Freud of the Vespers.
• Extra rewards based on number of enemies destroyed.
• Destroy the large skyrmion generators located throughout the Xylem's drive block.
• Deactivate all ECM fog control devices and survey Xylem, the floating city.
• Deactivate all ECM fog control devices and survey Xylem, the floating city.
• Destroy all parasite modules set by Overseer

• Destroy all the Rubicon Liberation Front logistics helicopters.
• Extra rewards based on number of enemies destroyed.
• Destroy the LCs and new HC deployed by the Planetary Closure Administration.
• Mop up Dafeng MT squads deployed in Grid 135.

• Eliminate Michigan, the Redguns' top commanding officer, and destroy the Redguns' main MT force.
• Extra rewards based on number of enemies destroyed.
• Eliminate V.III O'Keeffe, Arquebus Special Intelligence officer.
• Defend the old spaceport and prevent its recapture by the Planetary Closure Administration.

• Eliminate the Junker Coyotes, a Doser faction invading Grid 086.
• Extra rewards based on number of enemies destroyed.

• Destroy all Rubicon Liberation Front artillery installations.
• Extra rewards based on number of enemies destroyed.
• Destroy the Dafeng Core Industries Tester AC.

This VR simulator for basic mercenary training is provided by ALLMIND. ---------------- Pilot a training craft to learn the basics of combat.
• Training Subjects Lock-on/Reloading/Missile Lock/ Melee Weapons/Scanning

This VR simulator for basic mercenary training is provided by ALLMIND. ---------------- Pilot a training craft to learn the basics of combat.
• Training Subjects Charge Attacks/ACS Strain & Stagger/ Direct Hits/ACS Accumulative Strain/Surprise Attacks/ Shield Defense/Attack Indicators & Initial Guard/ Assault Boost Attacks

This VR simulator for intermediate mercenary support is provided by ALLMIND. ---------------- Pilot a training craft to learn its behavior and features.
• Training Subjects Double Trigger/Boosters & Mobility/ Generators & Basic Specs/FCS & Engagement Distance/ AC Assembly & Strategy

This VR simulator for intermediate mercenary support is provided by ALLMIND. ---------------- Pilot a training craft to learn its behavior and features.
• Training Subjects Reverse-Joint Parts/Area Attacks/Weapon Types/ Energy Weapons and Overheating/Ricochets

This VR simulator for intermediate mercenary support is provided by ALLMIND. ---------------- Pilot a training craft to learn its behavior and features.
• Training Subjects Tetrapod Parts/Recoil/ Hovering-Based Tactics

This VR simulator for intermediate mercenary support is provided by ALLMIND. ---------------- Pilot a training craft to learn its behavior and features.
• Training Subjects Tank Parts & Strategy/Drifting

This VR simulator for advanced mercenary certification is provided by ALLMIND. ---------------- Assemble your own AC and complete evaluation.
• Training Subjects Adaptive Assemblies
